text: I like the book but I do not like the inexpensive binding. It has no heft and seems far too light for a 600 page volume. Would I buy it again? Yes. The price was right. For $22 I guess one should not expect a leather bound library quality piece.
date: Reviewed in the United States ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸ on 15 February 2022
title: Good looking book

text: A terrible book, there is nothing deluxe about this hardcover. The book is very lightweight for 600 pages, understandably so as the materials used are very cheap and flimsy. The pages are thin enough to be nearly translucent, the words on one side of the page can be seen on the other and the pages often stick together and hardly at all lay flat, the ends tending to curve upwards.A very disappointing purchase that I quickly returned.

title: Cheap Binding and Thin Pages
